about.title: falcaoaugustos
about.description: Hi, I'm a just knowledge explorer, open-source contributor, always on the lookout for new challenges. Here I describe some of my passions: share knowledge, design and implementation of projects, programming contests, new technologies, table tennis, basketball, games, music. I'm currently working as an iOS • watchOS • tvOS developer at Apple Developer Academy (former) BEPiD). I like going to in meetups and whenever possible I help to organize some local meetings.
about.author: falcaoaugustos
